attributes.action: Abolish Income Tax on Overtime and Bonuses earned
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned call upon Her Majesty's Government to consider abolishing the tax that it paid on overtime and bonuses earned.
We understand that tax has to be paid on normal earnings, but feel that it would be an incentive for those who are willing to work overtime and as a way of helping the economy by putting more money in the pockets of the workers so that they are more likely to spend it.
